title: President Donald J. Trump’s Fight Against the Opioid Epidemic Continues to Help Americans Around the Country – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Healthcare	

Issued on:
March 19, 2019
Together, we will defeat this epidemic – it’s a true epidemic – as one people, one family, and one magnificent nation under God.
						President Donald J. Trump					MAKING PROGRESS: On the one-year anniversary of the launch of President Donald J. Trump’s initiative to tackle the driving forces of the Opioid Crisis, progress has been made.CUTTING OFF THE SUPPLY: In the past year, the Administration has taken action to target the international and domestic suppliers of illicit opioids.REDUCING DEMAND: Along with cutting down on the supply of opioids, the Administration has made great strides in reducing demand in the United States.HELPING AMERICANS RECOVER: President Trump and his Administration are helping individuals afflicted by drug addiction throughout the country.
